trans-unit.source: ATA update to 1.5 migration guide | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: ATA update to 1.5 migration guide | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Procedures to update ATA to version 1.5
trans-unit.target: Procedures to update ATA to version 1.5

trans-unit.source: ATA update to 1.5 migration guide
trans-unit.target: ATA update to 1.5 migration guide

trans-unit.source: The update to ATA 1.5 provides improvements in the following areas:
trans-unit.target: The update to ATA 1.5 provides improvements in the following areas:

trans-unit.source: Faster detection times
trans-unit.target: Faster detection times

trans-unit.source: Enhanced automatic detection algorithm for NAT (network address translation) devices
trans-unit.target: Enhanced automatic detection algorithm for NAT (network address translation) devices

trans-unit.source: Enhanced name resolution process for non-domain joined devices
trans-unit.target: Enhanced name resolution process for non-domain joined devices

trans-unit.source: Support for data migration during product updates
trans-unit.target: Support for data migration during product updates

trans-unit.source: Better UI responsiveness for suspicious activities with thousands of entities involved
trans-unit.target: Better UI responsiveness for suspicious activities with thousands of entities involved

trans-unit.source: Improved auto-resolution of monitoring alerts
trans-unit.target: Improved auto-resolution of monitoring alerts

trans-unit.source: Additional performance counters for enhanced monitoring and troubleshooting
trans-unit.target: Additional performance counters for enhanced monitoring and troubleshooting

trans-unit.source: Updating ATA to version 1.5
trans-unit.target: Updating ATA to version 1.5

trans-unit.source: If ATA is not installed in your environment, download the full version of ATA which includes version 1.5 and follow the standard installation procedure described in [Install ATA](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/install-ata).
trans-unit.target: If ATA is not installed in your environment, download the full version of ATA which includes version 1.5 and follow the standard installation procedure described in [Install ATA](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/install-ata).

trans-unit.source: If you already have ATA version 1.4 deployed, this procedure will walk you through the steps necessary to update your installation.
trans-unit.target: If you already have ATA version 1.4 deployed, this procedure will walk you through the steps necessary to update your installation.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to update to ATA version 1.5:
trans-unit.target: Follow these steps to update to ATA version 1.5:

trans-unit.source: Download update 1.5
trans-unit.target: Download update 1.5

trans-unit.source: You can also use the updated full version of ATA to perform the update to version 1.5.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the updated full version of ATA to perform the update to version 1.5.

trans-unit.source: Update the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Update the ATA Center

trans-unit.source: Download the updated ATA Gateway package
trans-unit.target: Download the updated ATA Gateway package

trans-unit.source: Update the ATA Gateways
trans-unit.target: Update the ATA Gateways

trans-unit.source: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.
trans-unit.target: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Update the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Update the ATA Center

trans-unit.source: Back up your database: (optional)
trans-unit.target: Back up your database: (optional)

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Center is running as a virtual machine and you want to take a checkpoint, shut the virtual machine down first.
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Center is running as a virtual machine and you want to take a checkpoint, shut the virtual machine down first.

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Center is running on a physical server, follow the recommended procedure to [back up MongoDB](https://docs.mongodb.org/manual/core/backups/).
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Center is running on a physical server, follow the recommended procedure to [back up MongoDB](https://docs.mongodb.org/manual/core/backups/).

trans-unit.source: Run the update file, Microsoft ATA Center Update.exe, and follow the instructions on the screen to install the update.
trans-unit.target: Run the update file, Microsoft ATA Center Update.exe, and follow the instructions on the screen to install the update.

trans-unit.source: In the **Welcome** page, select your language and click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Welcome** page, select your language and click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Read the End User License Agreement and if you accept the terms, click the checkbox and click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Read the End User License Agreement and if you accept the terms, click the checkbox and click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Select whether you want to run the full (default) or partial migration.
trans-unit.target: Select whether you want to run the full (default) or partial migration.

trans-unit.source: Choose full or partial migration
trans-unit.target: Choose full or partial migration

trans-unit.source: If you select **Partial** migration, any network traffic collected and forwarded Windows events analyzed by ATA will be deleted and user behavioral profiles will have to be re-learned; this takes a minimum of three weeks.
trans-unit.target: If you select **Partial** migration, any network traffic collected and forwarded Windows events analyzed by ATA will be deleted and user behavioral profiles will have to be re-learned; this takes a minimum of three weeks.

trans-unit.source: If you are running low on disk space then it is helpful to run a **Partial** migration.
trans-unit.target: If you are running low on disk space then it is helpful to run a **Partial** migration.

trans-unit.source: If you run a **Full** migration, you will need additional disk space, as calculated for you on the upgrade page, and the migration may take longer, depending on the network traffic.
trans-unit.target: If you run a **Full** migration, you will need additional disk space, as calculated for you on the upgrade page, and the migration may take longer, depending on the network traffic.

trans-unit.source: The full migration retains all previously collected data and user behavioral profiles are maintained, meaning that it will not take additional time for ATA to learn behavior profiles and anomalous behavior can be detected immediately after update.
trans-unit.target: The full migration retains all previously collected data and user behavioral profiles are maintained, meaning that it will not take additional time for ATA to learn behavior profiles and anomalous behavior can be detected immediately after update.

trans-unit.source: Click **Update**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Update**.

trans-unit.source: Once you click Update, ATA is offline until the update procedure is complete.
trans-unit.target: Once you click Update, ATA is offline until the update procedure is complete.

trans-unit.source: After updating the ATA Center, the ATA Gateways will report that they are now outdated.
trans-unit.target: After updating the ATA Center, the ATA Gateways will report that they are now outdated.

trans-unit.source: Outdated gateways image
trans-unit.target: Outdated gateways image

trans-unit.source: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.
trans-unit.target: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.

trans-unit.source: Step 2.
trans-unit.target: Step 2.

trans-unit.source: Download the ATA Gateway setup package
trans-unit.target: Download the ATA Gateway setup package

trans-unit.source: After configuring the domain connectivity settings you can download the ATA Gateway setup package.
trans-unit.target: After configuring the domain connectivity settings you can download the ATA Gateway setup package.

trans-unit.source: To download the ATA Gateway package:
trans-unit.target: To download the ATA Gateway package:

trans-unit.source: Delete any previous versions of the ATA Gateway package you previously downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Delete any previous versions of the ATA Gateway package you previously downloaded.

trans-unit.source: On the ATA Gateway machine, open a browser and enter the IP address you configured in the ATA Center for the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: On the ATA Gateway machine, open a browser and enter the IP address you configured in the ATA Center for the ATA Console.

trans-unit.source: When the ATA Console opens, click on the settings icon and select **Configuration**.
trans-unit.target: When the ATA Console opens, click on the settings icon and select **Configuration**.

trans-unit.source: Configuration settings icon
trans-unit.target: Configuration settings icon

trans-unit.source: In the **ATA Gateways** tab, click **Download ATA Gateway Setup**.
trans-unit.target: In the **ATA Gateways** tab, click **Download ATA Gateway Setup**.

trans-unit.source: Save the package locally.
trans-unit.target: Save the package locally.

trans-unit.source: The zip file includes the following:
trans-unit.target: The zip file includes the following:

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway installer
trans-unit.target: ATA Gateway installer

trans-unit.source: Configuration setting file with the required information to connect to the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Configuration setting file with the required information to connect to the ATA Center

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Update the ATA Gateways
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Update the ATA Gateways

trans-unit.source: On each ATA Gateway, extract the files from the ATA Gateway package and run the file Microsoft ATA Gateway Setup.
trans-unit.target: On each ATA Gateway, extract the files from the ATA Gateway package and run the file Microsoft ATA Gateway Setup.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this ATA Gateway package to install new ATA Gateways.
trans-unit.target: You can also use this ATA Gateway package to install new ATA Gateways.

trans-unit.source: Your previous settings will be preserved, but it may take a few minutes until for the service to restart.
trans-unit.target: Your previous settings will be preserved, but it may take a few minutes until for the service to restart.

trans-unit.source: Repeat this step for all other ATA Gateways deployed.
trans-unit.target: Repeat this step for all other ATA Gateways deployed.

trans-unit.source: After successfully updating an ATA Gateway, the outdated notification for the specific ATA Gateway will go away.
trans-unit.target: After successfully updating an ATA Gateway, the outdated notification for the specific ATA Gateway will go away.

trans-unit.source: You will know that all the ATA Gateways have been successfully updated when all the ATA Gateways report that they are successfully synced and the message that an updated ATA Gateway package is available is no longer displayed.
trans-unit.target: You will know that all the ATA Gateways have been successfully updated when all the ATA Gateways report that they are successfully synced and the message that an updated ATA Gateway package is available is no longer displayed.

trans-unit.source: Updated gateways image
trans-unit.target: Updated gateways image

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: See Also

trans-unit.source: Check out the ATA forum!
trans-unit.target: Check out the ATA forum!
